column2: Do you want to hurry up and die, you brat?
speaker: Mogok

old: 木偶どもにはもう飽きたわ
column2: I'm tired of these puppets already.
speaker: Mogok

old:
わからんな――
お前に勝ち目などない
column2: I don't understand— you don't stand a chance.
speaker: Mogok

old:
殺し合いの最中に――
笑わせてくれるわ
column2: In the midst of the killing, You make me laugh.
speaker: Mogok

old:
帰れ――殺すぞ？
おまえは好かん
column2: Go home... or I'll kill you. I don't like you.
speaker: Mogok

old: まだ盾突くか――ならば、死をくれてやる
column2: If you still dare to thrust your shield――then allow me to give you death
speaker: Mogok

old:
殺す、ただ殺す
それが世界だ
column2: Kill, just kill. That's how the world works.
speaker: Mogok

old:
気づいているだろうが――
おまえらの死は無駄にはならん
ふははは！
column2:
You may have noticed, but...
Your deaths will not be in vain.
Hahaha!
speaker: Mogok

old:
その命、よこせ
さあ、よこせ！
column2: Give me that life. Come on, give it to me!
speaker: Mogok
